document_data.name: Odelia
document_data.mainbody: '''Odelia''' was the lady-in-waiting who served [[Arietta Seasilver|Lady Arietta]] of [[Seasilver|House Seasilver]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref name='Sent-p24">
document_data.Personality: She was a dutiful attendant, seeing to all of Lady Arietta's needs without complaint.<ref name='Sent-p24" /><ref name='Sent-p30">
document_data.History: When [[Marsember]] was assaulted by the [[shade]]s of [[Netheril]], on [[Uktar 2]] of the {{YearlinkName|1486}}, Odelia was directed to stay behind at the family's city estate while the nobles and their soldiers fled to [[Elversult]].<ref name='Sent-p25"> While Arietta tried to smuggle Odelia aboard the family's ship within one of her larger trunks, they did not act swiftly enough.<ref name='Sent-p29"> Odelia was slain by a shade that made its way into Lady Arietta's chambers within the Seasilver estate.<ref name='Sent-p35">
